website_summaries.verdict: Don't have a secure spot to suspend a porch swing? That's not a concern with this free-standing Outsunny model that comes with user-friendly features for 2 occupants.
pros: Has its own steel frame, so you can place it on the porch, patio, or deck with no need to suspend it from an overhead structure
Has an adjustable canopy and 2 individual cushioned seats
Weight capacity is 250 pounds per seat
cons: Measures 67 x 53.5 x 67 inches, so it takes up a bit of space
Seat cushions are comfortable, but the fabric is prone to fading

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this swing set because of the price. A friend had paid nearly $1000 for something similar. However, we are so pleased with this swing. The tubes are strong, the cushions are large and comfy and it was easy to assemble. You can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Shields

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Style
customer_reviews.text: This swing is exactly as described. It is easy to put together and is so stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: The swing was easy to put together. Love how it swings and how it keeps the sun away also!! Love it!! Everyone who sees it ask where we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Butts

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Had it put together by a person that does this and he stated that the swing does not sit right, legs fly up when you swing. Also not able to sit your whole bottom on it to swing your legs hang off in a uncomfortable spot , which makes your feet lay on ground so you can’t swing with your legs dragging. And I only weight 125. Was not easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pfohler

customer_reviews.title: Great Swing!
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward assembly. Simple instructions. Parts were vacume wrapped and secure in a cloth drawstring bag. Shipped in 2 sturdy boxes. Took about an hour and half to assemble by myself and taking my time. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: WVTip

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble! Sturdy material!
customer_reviews.text: Love the dual swing set. Easy to assemble. My grandson, age 6, worked along with my son to assemble it. Made of sturdy material. Love, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fun
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about it when ordering. But we are very satisfied. It was easy to assemble. It is lightweight; you can carry it around the deck. It is sturdy. My daughter and I enjoy it a lot. She reads books while swinging.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Awning not adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: One of the main reasons I bought this swing was for the adjustable awning. I put it together and the awnings are stationary!! The supports are fixed in place. There are also a couple of spots where the finish is a little ruff. I don’t know if is a bad finish there or they painted over rust. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: airmanmk

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and possibly used??
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this there were only 5 star reviews so I thought it was going to be great. Came all scratched up and everyone who has seen has asked it it was used. I am 6'3' and it's way too low to be comfortable. Cushions are garbage and will probably turn to dust in 6 months. Cup holders are a joke. Save your money for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Trish McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my FAVORITE swing ever!! Everyone loves it! I love to swing, and I want to go my speed, not someone else’s! So it’s so great to sit beside my sweetheart and not want to kill him for slowing me down!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Yates

customer_reviews.title: Best Birthday present every!
customer_reviews.text: Truly happy with this 2 person swing. There are a few places where the stitching needs to be reinforced, but very miner. This is where my husband and I spend our evening.
customer_reviews.author: Rae C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I put the swing together over a few hours by myself. Instructions relatively clear and you don't need much strength to put anything together. I'm very happy with the swing, quality is great and I love the feature of having the little side tables attached to set your drink/phone on.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Nice swing
customer_reviews.text: Identifying scores were a little tuff to figure. Parts easy but some of the directions were not great trying to figure what was what. I do really like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great swing. Separate chairs is great. She likes to swing more then I do so this absolutely makes both of us happy
customer_reviews.author: Russ Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Small for patio use.
customer_reviews.text: This swing is so nice when one person can swing at a time,my husband swings fast and I swing slow.
customer_reviews.author: dorothy rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This swing seems to be of high quality. I bought it for my back deck and we absolutely love it. It’s comfortable and fun to swing on, the kids love it too! Excellent buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kariann

customer_reviews.title: Seems strong and sturdy but. . .
customer_reviews.text: We've had our swing for less than a month. The wind blew it against our table and bent the arms on one swing, fell on my arse. Must have been one wicked wind.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Plus!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second swing. Just wish replacement cushions were available.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Abel

customer_reviews.title: two can swing at different pace.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product using it as a porch swing. It would be better if the canopy's were easier to take off or put on.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable swing.
customer_reviews.text: Love my swing. I like the two separate swings so each person can swing at their own pace. Need 2 people to set it up. Instructions weren't the greatest but figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene LaPlante

customer_reviews.title: Well Built - Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built swing that's easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: the directions that come with it are for an entirely different swing set
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact that there weren't any directions for putting it together. The seat is a little short for longer legs.
customer_reviews.author: dl66

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Easy to assemble. Very comfortable, and sturdy. Glad I went with this one
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Complete parts
customer_reviews.text: Really like the swing! Missing some parts though. How do i get in touch with seller?
customer_reviews.author: Keith W. Bourne

customer_reviews.title: it satisfied my expectations, it provided the perfect lounge for my wife and I
customer_reviews.text: It's nice with two seats, both people don't have to swing
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product from professional seller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product from professional seller. One of the best customer service I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: joseph labib

customer_reviews.title: Seat cushions are junk, fade quickly and stain easily. IMPOSSIBLE TO REPLACE!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE: No replacement seat cushions. Cushions fade fast and and stain easily. There are no replacement cushions on the market for this swing. This company picked the worst possible color for an outdoor swing and the material as well as the cushioning are extremely poor. I give this a 1 star until they put fourth a bit more effort to improve the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: lonestar

customer_reviews.title: Still Recommend! Good Company to Deal With!@
customer_reviews.text: This Swing was Awesome..It is Sturdy..Swings Independently. WE Bought 2 sets in December 2 years ago....Problem was the Canvas doesn't hold up to Alabama Seering Sun..A week ago we had to dump both sets..My Husband fell through Canvas Seat!! Since the company doesn't offer any parts or any alternatives to replace anything we regretfully had to dump both sets..We even bought covers !! Pretty spendy... When I bought them they were $200..2017...Still I recommend this set if your able to keep in shade..We loved them...
customer_reviews.author: ALABAMA

product_meta.title: Outsunny Modern Outdoor Relax Chairs with 2 Separate Swinging Chairs, Safety Handrails, and Removable Shade Canopy, Beige
feature_bullets: ✅OUTDOOR SWING CHAIRS: With its modern design and classic beige color, this outdoor swing furniture is perfect for the porch, patio, garden, yard, poolside or other outside living space.
✅2 INDEPENDENT SEATS: Two separate cushioned seats with built-in handrails provide superior comfort, so two people can swing back and forth at their own pace.
✅ADJUSTABLE CANOPY: The angle of the canopy top adjusts for optimal shade coverage. If you prefer to enjoy the sun rather than stay in the shade, you can remove the canopy easily.
✅COMFORTABLE DESIGN: With a cup holder on each side, you can enjoy your favorite drinks while relaxing. Soft cushions and a cushioned backrest on each seat add to the comfort.

✅SOLID CONSTRUCTION: The sturdy steel frame and stable base supports 242 lbs. per set. Heavy springs connect the swing to the frame for a smooth, gentle rocking motion. Durable polyester fabric ensures enjoyment for years to come.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars54 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
